articles.author: Edith M. Lederer
articles.title: US refuses to blame Russia for Ukraine war, splitting with European allies in UN votes - The Associated Press
articles.description: In a dramatic shift in transatlantic relations under President Donald Trump, the United States has split with its European allies by refusing to blame Russia for its invasion of Ukraine in votes on three U.N. resolutions seeking an end to the three-year war. …
articles.content: UNITED NATIONS (AP) In a dramatic shift in transatlantic relations under President Donald Trump, the United States split with its European allies by refusing to blame Russia for its invasion of Ukrai… [+6331 chars]

articles.title: Macron walks tightrope with Trump as he makes Europe's case on Ukraine - BBC.com
articles.description: As the first European leader to visit Trump since his inauguration, Macron navigated potentially testing talks.
articles.content:
Relations between Europe and the US are unquestionably in crisis, so merely keeping things together as French President Emmanuel Macron did at the White House on Monday stands as an achievement.
